Class RouletteGui

java.lang.Object

                              eecs.RouletteGui
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, jago.Realism, jago.element.ReflectiveColors, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, RouletteData, jago.element.SensorState, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RouletteDemo
public class RouletteGui
extends RobotGuiBase
implements RouletteData

A roulette simulation. This class uses the simulation interface to create a roulette table. The functionality provided is only for visuals and generating a random result from spinning the wheel; no scoring capability is included.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getBallSpace

public static int getBallSpace()
Determines what space (number) that the ball stopped in.

Returns:
Empty

getSpaceColor

public static int getSpaceColor()
Determines the color of the space that the ball stopped in. Values returned will be one of RED_SPACE, BLACK_SPACE, or GREEN_SPACE.

Returns:
The space color, from RouletteData constants.

addChipColor

public static void addChipColor(java.lang.String color)
Adds a bet on the board on the outside black or red bet.

Parameters:
color - a String of either "red" or "black"

addChipColumn

public static void addChipColumn(java.lang.String choice)
Adds a bet marker for the column (2to1) bets.

Parameters:
choice - "left", "middle", or "right"

addChipHighLow

public static void addChipHighLow(java.lang.String choice)
Adds a chip to either the 1to18 (low) or 19to36 (high) board space.

Parameters:
choice - Either "LOW" or "HIGH"

addChipNumber

public static void addChipNumber(int value)
Places a bet on the board over the specified number.

Parameters:
value - The number to bet on.

addChipOddEven

public static void addChipOddEven(java.lang.String choice)
Adds a chip to either the ODD or EVEN board space.

Parameters:
choice - Either "ODD" or "EVEN"

addChipSection

public static void addChipSection(java.lang.String choice)
Adds a bet marker for the section bets (1st 12, 2nd 12, 3rd 12).

Parameters:
choice - "1st", "2nd", "3rd"

clearTable

public static void clearTable()
Removes all chips from the table

pauseFor

public static void pauseFor(int ms)
Causes the simulation to wait for the specified amount of time.

Parameters:
ms - The number of milliseconds to wait.

public static void spin()
Perform one spin of the roulette wheel.
